meanings.sent1: The tree had protruding roots that tripped unwary hikers.
meanings.sent2: The cat's protruding whiskers twitched with curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The protruding branch seemed to wave at passersby in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her protruding ears caught every whisper in the room.
meanings.sent5: The protruding mountain peak loomed majestically against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The protruding rock formation provided a perfect spot for bird nests.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a protruding balcony overlooking the garden.
meanings.sent3: The protruding shelf held a comical array of knick-knacks.
meanings.sent4: His protruding chin gave him a distinguished look.
meanings.sent5: The protruding cliff edge offered a breathtaking view of the valley below.

meanings.sent1: The protruding wire posed a safety hazard in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: The protruding nail caught on her sweater as she walked by.
meanings.sent3: The protruding handle on the drawer made it easy to open.
meanings.sent4: His protruding belly strained against the tight shirt.
meanings.sent5: The protruding roots of the old tree snaked across the yard.
